rooms.description: Spacious entrance with reception area and wheelchair ramp.
Open plan living area integrated with the kitchen. Designed for easy navigation with minimal thresholds.
Modern industrial kitchen with accessible layout and built-in appliances.
Open dining area adjacent to the living room for seamless interaction.
Accessible utility space for laundry and storage.

openings.description: Large windows for natural light and ventilation, complying with Vastu principles.
Ample window space to ensure a well-lit and ventilated kitchen area.
Spacious balcony door leading to an accessible balcony with ample space for wheelchair maneuverability.
Balcony door integrated with a wheelchair-accessible balcony area.
